mapper.select: select * from question join answer on question.questionId = answer.questionId where answerId = #{answerId};
select * from question left join answer on question.questionId = answer.questionId where question.questionId = #{questionId};
mapper.insert: insert into question (title, content, author, createDate, status) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{author}, now(), #{status});
insert into answer (content, author, createDate, questionId) values (#{content}, #{author}, now(), #{questionId});
